title: RUNES NOT SHOWING UP IN NEW CLIENT
body: Currently my runes are not showing up in the new client. It is very annoying because in my ranked games I am not able to use runes.

replies.body: Same Thing happening to me Let us know whats up

Do you mean that you can't see it while in champion select?  If that's the case, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a look.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!
